reviews.review: perfecto es bueno para pasar tiempo,lo recomiendo 10/10

My absolute favorite game of all time! I come back to it at least twice a year for it's brilliant writing, it's great comedy and it's incredible level design. Definitely worth your time to play, if for some reason you haven't played it already.

Its got 2 game modes called freeplay or campaign and avalable on steam and xbox and ps4.

Absolutely love this game. Such a cool atmosphere, great puzzles (some get pretty hard but not hard enough to where it's frustrating), and the story was really interesting too. 
Also, co-op in this game is so fun, 100% recommend doing it.

Just wow. Shorter than I wanted it to be. Felt shorter than Portal, but still an amazing single player play through. The real gem in this though is the co-op mutiplayer mode with an extensive pile of puzzles requiring a pair of players to complete (also nice is that the puzzles requiring two players to solve are a bit trickier that the single player ones!)

Solid game play, Wheatley is hilarious 10/10

Its like the first Portal game... but better in every way, More complex puzzles, better environments, even better gameplay, a much better lore development and for some reason, Portal 2 runs better than Portal 1. Even on high settings. I'm not sure why this happened, but I'm glad I get to run Portal 2 with amazing FPS on High settings.
Outstanding single-player and co-op campaigns! potato/10

[h1]传送门2 [/h1]

[b] 主观评测：创意的终极碰撞 [/b]
“这居然是十年前的游戏？”这是当我第一次进入这款作品时我内心的真实感受。没错，时至今日， 2011年发售的传送门2依旧是史上评分最高的游戏之一。无论是画面、角色配音，还是关卡的设计、脑洞，它都太精致了，V社真正向我展示了游戏到底能有多超前，传送门2的玩法绝对是划时代的。更令人感到惊喜的是，创意工坊的加入允许世界上每一个玩家分享自己的想法，这种相互之间的思维碰撞让我惊叹。传送门2是真正的游戏，它的社区也是真正的社区。

[u] 闪光之处：完美的科幻题材之作   [/u]

+角色演出到位，配音很有感觉
+剧情的反转颇具脑洞
+玩法超前，社区创新永无止境

[u] 不足之处：晕 [/u]

-V社游戏的传统，3D眩晕

[i] 个人评分：（10/10）[/i]

视效：☐三年系列☐勉强接受☐不错☐悦目✓ CG=电影

界面：☐恶心☐反人类☐中规中矩✓ 流畅舒适☐专业

操作：☐拙劣☐游戏玩我☐平凡☐行云流水✓ 体感游戏

美术：☐画图.exe ☐幼儿园作业☐还行✓ 风格独特☐设定集
